channel.title: smart home on Ivanković family website
channel.description: Recent content in smart home on Ivanković family website

item.title: Smart Home Intro
item.description: Introduction This series of blog posts is my laboratory notebook as I try, and hopefully succeed in upgrading a 14 year old central european house into a smart home. Starting point The house is 14 years old. It is a well built central european house, with a two-shell external walls made from reinforced concrete and bricks, internal walls made from bricks or reinforced concrete and cieling made exclusively from reinforced concrete.
